list-view-config.query-select:
PREFIX afn: <http://jena.apache.org/ARQ/function#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?person ?personName ?org ?orgLabel
WHERE { ?subject ?property ?person . ?org ?property ?person . OPTIONAL { ?person rdfs:label ?personName } OPTIONAL { ?org rdfs:label ?orgLabel } FILTER NOT EXISTS{ ?subject rdfs:label ?orgLabel } } ORDER BY ?personName
